meanings.definition: A small, lively dog breed known for its feisty personality.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor's feists always bark at squirrels in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The feists at the park were running around energetically.
meanings.sent3: The feists chased each other in circles, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her feists were like tiny warriors, ready to protect their territory.
meanings.sent5: The feists' playful nature made them a joy to be around.

meanings.sent1: She feists through every challenge with a positive attitude.
meanings.sent2: The team feists to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: He feists his way through the obstacle course, never giving up.
meanings.sent4: The young artist feists to create a masterpiece that will inspire others.
meanings.sent5: The student feists to excel in all subjects, pushing themselves to do their best.

meanings.sent1: The little girl was a feists, always full of energy and enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: The feists in the class brought a lively atmosphere to the group.
meanings.sent3: The feists in the family was the one who kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her son was a feists, never backing down from a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The feists in the office was known for their contagious enthusiasm.
